page.title: 13VILLAGE CHANGES SINCE 1900.
page.content: At the beginning of this century a high percentage of employed people in Abberley Parish found work within the area in farming,coal-mining,stone quarrying,brick making and domestic work in the nearby Halls <Abberley Hall,Witley Court and The Elms>. Few people would venture further than Worcester or Kidderminster,mainly because of the difficulty of travel. Household life has changed dramatically,especially over the last twenty years.Such changes are noted in the findings from questionnaires sent to 100 households via the children of Abberley Parochial Primary School an Pensax Primary School. {SUMMARY OF QUESTIONNAIRES.} 1.51% of mothers were born ih the county of Hereford and Worcester,and 49%of fathers. 6% from each household were born
